articles.title: 58 arrested for employment offences in raids at public entertainment outlets
articles.content: They include 32 foreigners found to be working illegally as performing artistes. The remaining 22 foreigners and four Singapore permanent residents were arrested for employment-related offences, the agencies said. In addition, two more people were caught in possession of e-vaporisers, and six e-vaporisers were...
